TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Haitutuan, title = Haitutuan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haitutuan} }

S.FORM: alang Haitutuan ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Umitan go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 108 buwan, 344 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 83% kyan ku 286 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 17% kyan ku 58 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 69%, Amis 3%, Paywan 3%, Puyuma 1%, Rukay 1%, Tayan 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 5%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Haitutuan hya' ga Takinusta. tay mkyahu' na Haitutuan hya' ga Kusunuki. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Haitutuan ga ungat kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas. khu skwan biru maki 1 khu skwan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Haitotoan ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Umitan go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 108 bowan, 344 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 83% kyan ko 286 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 17% kyan ko 58 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 69%, Amis 3%, Paywan 3%, Poyoma 1%, Rokay 1%, Tayan 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 5%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Haitotoan hya' ga Takinosta. tay mkyaho' na Haitotoan hya' ga Kosonoki. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Haitotoan ga ongat kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas. kho skwan biro maki 1 kho skwan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
